name: tharun-health-tracker-mobile
description: React Native mobile app for Tharun Health Tracker with HealthKit/Health Connect integration

scripts.ios:clean: cd ios && rm -rf build Pods Podfile.lock *.xcworkspace
scripts.clean: npm run ios:clean && npm run android:clean && rm -rf node_modules && npm install
scripts.bundle:ios: react-native bundle --entry-file index.js --platform ios --dev false --bundle-output ios/main.jsbundle --assets-dest ios
scripts.bundle:android: react-native bundle --entry-file index.js --platform android --dev false --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res
scripts.release:ios: npm run bundle:ios && cd ios && xcodebuild -workspace TharunHealthTrackerMobile.xcworkspace -scheme TharunHealthTrackerMobile -configuration Release archive
